ca.ualberta.team7project.network

Class ThreadFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team7project.network.ThreadFetcher

  • public class ThreadFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Fetches comments from the server

    Prepares search strings for ElasticSearchOperation

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ThreadFetcher.SortMethod
      Enumeration of methods used to get the "best/most relevant" topics

      • EnablePictureSort

      • SetLocation

        public void SetLocation(double latitude,
               double longitude)
        Insert the user's location for proximity sorting

        This must be called if passing in SortMethod.LOCATION, else the user's location is treated as [0, 0]

        Parameters:
        latitude -
        longitude -

        public void InitCacheOperation(ThreadFetcher.SortMethod sort)

      • fetchTaggedComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> fetchTaggedComments(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags)
        Fetch comments that match a set of tags

        Only comments with all the specified tags are fetched

        Parameters:
        tags - a list of tags
        Returns:
        list of comments/topics

      • fetchComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> fetchComments(ThreadFetcher.SortMethod sort)
        Fetch comments globally (so not by parent) by location/date
        Parameters:
        sort - sorting method
        Returns:
        list of comments/topics

      • fetchChildComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> fetchChildComments(java.util.UUID parentID,
                                                  ThreadFetcher.SortMethod sort)
        Fetch comments by parent (and location/date)

        Can be used to fetch only direct children of a thread (pass parentID = ThreadModel.ROOT)

        Parameters:
        parentID - UUID of parent comment
        sort - sorting method
        Returns:
        list of comments (or topics if parentID = null)

      • fetchFavorites

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> fetchFavorites(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.UUID> favorites,
                                              ThreadFetcher.SortMethod sort)
        Fetch comments by a list of their own UUID's

        Used to fetch the list of favorited comments from server

        Parameters:
        favorites - list of UUID's for favorited comments
        sort - sorting method
        Returns:
        list of favorited comments
